tool_description: Evaluates vendor creditworthiness and financial stability using financial documents, credit reports, and business metrics to assign risk ratings.

years_in_business.description: Number of years the vendor has been in business

include_credit_bureau.description: Whether to include credit bureau data

error_messages: Invalid financial data: Annual revenue must be a positive number.
Years in business invalid: Must be a positive integer representing actual years in operation.
Credit limit out of range: Requested credit limit must be between $1,000 and $1,000,000.
Industry sector not recognized: Provide a valid industry classification.
Insufficient data for assessment: Unable to complete risk assessment due to missing financial information.
usage: Provide vendor_id, annual_revenue, years_in_business, and industry_sector. Optionally set requested_credit_limit and include_credit_bureau flag. The tool returns comprehensive risk assessment.

risk_rating.description: Risk rating category (low, medium, high, critical)

recommended_credit_limit.description: Recommended credit limit based on assessment

assessment_factors.description: Key factors influencing the risk assessment
